channel.title: Tag: sqlite - blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Using SQLite as a document database for Mastodon exports
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: SQLite has JSON functions, generated columns, and full-text search - which all seems like a perfect mix for ingesting exports from Mastodon for search!</body></html>
